page.title: 08THE NEW A 45 BY-PASS
page.content:
THE NEW A.45 BY_PASS.
The new road is a by_pass,started about two years ago,which takes the A.45 Northampton road to the north of Rushden and will eventually by_pass Higham Ferrers and Stanwick.The road has cost millions of pounds and the machines used have included bulldozers,diggers,heavy rollers,dumpers and tarring equipment.Before building,the land was covered with crops and was part of Ditchford Lane.The road is a dual carriageway and has involved the construction of a new bridge over the main railway line,as well as two new roundabouts.The old road still serves to get to a farm. Matthew Suter.
